text:
Oh, I was just suggested this programme from a DMP friend: <https://gumroad.com/l/mentormeDMP|https://gumroad.com/l/mentormeDMP>

It could be worth having a look at. It isn’t for very long but it could give you some direct input from a DMP specialist.

attachments.title: MENTOR ME! LET'S BUILD YOUR ENTRY LEVEL MATTE PAINTING SHOWREEL
attachments.text: IDEAL FOR ENTRY LEVEL MATTE PAINTERS. We know how difficult it can be to get into VFX industry so that's why we have decided to offer our help.Let us help you build your Matte Painting showreel! JANUARY / FEBRUARY TERM. What will you learn? Matte Painting creation - tips, How to build a strong showreel to impress recruiters, Matte Painting workflow in VFX studios, Software fundamentals, Building your portfolio and online presence, and a lot more. -------------------------------------------------------- Limited number of sales
attachments.fallback: Gumroad: MENTOR ME! LET'S BUILD YOUR ENTRY LEVEL MATTE PAINTING SHOWREEL
